projects.title: Sveltype
projects.description: Typing game I created to help me learn the Svelte framework. Currently a work in progress.

projects.title: ePrescription Help
projects.description: Designed and developed the help web app for the national electronic prescription framework. Follows the theme of MedView Patient Connect.

projects.title: connecX
projects.description: Part of the connecX development team creating resident and building management software for smart residences.

projects.title: Ethereum Marketplace
projects.description: Created a blockchain marketplace using Ethereum, Solidity and Ganache. Users can buy and sell property once approved by their bank.

projects.title: Bookeroo
projects.description: Fullstack online bookstore with PayPal integration. Made with Spring microservices and React frontend. Dockerised and deployed to AWS with CI/CD through CircleCI.

projects.title: COVID-19 Testing Site
projects.description: View the testing sites nearest to you and their details. Check into the queue using QR code scanning.
